modelIdentification.name: NETN-Aggregate
modelIdentification.description: The NETN-Aggregate FOM Module provides a common standard interface for representation of Units in a federated distributed simulation. The module extends the existing RPR-FOM v2.0 standard with subclasses classes and additional attributes to allow additional information to be associated with simulated aggregate entities.
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.0.0 - Release included in NETN-FOM v1.0
v1.0.4 - Release included in NETN-FOM v2.0
v1.1.0 - Release included in NETN-FOM v3.0

poc.pocName: MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation
MSG-134 NATO Distributed Simulation Architecture & Design, Compliance Testing and Certification
MSG-106 Enhanced CAX Architecture, Desing and Methodology
MSG-068 NATO Education and Training Network

You are also allowed to develop your own new FOM Modules (in separate XML files and separate documentation) that build-on/extends the NETN module by reference. You are NOT allowed to modify the NETN FOM Module or its documentation without prior permission by the NATO Modelling and Simulation Group.

attribute.name: UniqueID
attribute.semantics: The unique identifier of the object.

attribute.name: Callsign
attribute.semantics: The name of the object.

attribute.name: Symbol
attribute.semantics: The APP6A code for the aggregate.

attribute.name: SourceUnit
attribute.semantics: Aggregate from which this aggregate was spawned.

attribute.name: HigherHeadquarters
attribute.semantics: A pointer to the aggregate's superior unit or headquarters. The highest level unit or headquarters on each side will publish its own UniqueID as its HigherHeadquarters value.

attribute.name: UnitPersonnel
attribute.semantics: This summarizes the health status of personnel comprising the aggregate.

attribute.name: Activity
attribute.semantics: The current activity of the aggregate. This may differ from the mission due to casualties, readiness, etc.

attribute.name: VisualSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to electro-optical detection.

attribute.name: Mission
attribute.semantics: The operational task the aggregate has been ordered to perform.

attribute.name: Mounted
attribute.semantics: The percentage of aggregate personnel travelling on or in their organic transport.

attribute.name: UnitSupplies
attribute.semantics: The type and quantities of supplies available (on hand) to the unit.

attribute.name: CombatValue
attribute.semantics: A summary value (in percent) of unit effectiveness based on level of training, leadership, moral, personnel and equipment operational status, etc.

attribute.name: WeaponsControlOrder
attribute.semantics: Describes current Weapon Control Order Free, Tight, or Hold.

attribute.name: SupportUnit
attribute.semantics: Identifies unit(s) which support the aggregate logistically, or with a specified combat or combat support relationship, e.g. a Direct Support or General Support Artillery unit.

attribute.name: CaptureStatus
attribute.semantics: The status of an aggregate with respect to its control or influence over its own activities.

attribute.name: UnitEquipment
attribute.semantics: This summarizes the health status of the equipment comprising the aggregate.

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: The level of command of the aggregate.

attribute.name: HUMINTSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

attribute.name: ElectronicSignature
attribute.semantics: Describes the aggregate's susceptibility to electronic detection both as a summary value and by identifying aggregate sensors together with their operational status.

attribute.name: Footprint
attribute.semantics: The region occupied by the aggregate. the region is defined as that bounded by line segments connecting the listed world locations.

attribute.name: CoverStatus
attribute.semantics: Describes the unit's protection from the effects of weapons fire.

attribute.name: EntityList
attribute.semantics: Provides data on entities comprising the aggregate.

attribute.name: Status
attribute.semantics: If an instance shall be taken into account by federates

attribute.name: EmbeddedUnitList
attribute.semantics: The list of objects carried by this aggregate.

attribute.name: Route
attribute.semantics:
A reference to a registered NETN_GeoObject.Path.
Optional.

attribute.name: Destination
attribute.semantics:
A reference to a registered NETN_GeoObject.Point.
Optional.

enumeratedData.name: CaptureStatusEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The status of a person or unit with respect to their control or influence over their own activities

enumeratedData.name: EchelonEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the relative size of the commonly accepted configuration of military formations (from JC3IEDM echelon-size-code)

enumeratedData.name: CoverEnum8
enumeratedData.semantics: The type of cover utilized by an aggregate

enumeratedData.name: ConcealmentEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The reason for the objects concealment

enumeratedData.name: UpdateTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Used to create, change, or delete an EntityList.

enumeratedData.name: SensorStateEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The emission states of aggregate sensors

arrayData.name: ArrayOfResourceStatus
arrayData.semantics: The array of health states for a named resource.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfEntityStruct
arrayData.semantics: Data for one or more entities that comprise an entity list.

arrayData.name: ArrayOfSensorStruct
arrayData.semantics: Array with definitio0ns of sensors, 1+ cardinality

field.name: DVOSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by direct view optics, i.e. the human eye, binoculars, or telescopes. A unit with zero percent signature would be concealed from DVO detection.

field.name: I2SignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by Image Intensifying sensors. A unit with zero percent signature would be invisible to image intensifiers (I2).

field.name: ThermalSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by thermal sensors. A unit with zero percent signature would be invisible to thermal sensors.

fixedRecordData.name: MissionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The operational task the aggregate has been ordered to perform, the time the mission was assigned, and the estimated completion time.

field.name: StartTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission start time

field.name: EndTime
field.semantics: An optional field providing the mission estimated end time

field.name: MissionEnum
field.semantics: The mission assigned to the aggregate

fixedRecordData.name: SupportRelationshipStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Identifies unit(s) which support the aggregate logistically, or with a specified combat or combat support relationship, e.g. a Direct Support or General Support Artillery unit.

field.name: SupportConsumer
field.semantics: The unique ID of the consumer of the support.

field.name: SupportProvider
field.semantics: The unique ID of the provider of the support.

field.name: SupportType
field.semantics: The type of support provided by the supporting unit.

fixedRecordData.name: HUMINTSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Describes the unit's susceptibility to human intelligence (HUMINT), i.e. information collected and provided by human sources.

field.name: HUMINTSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection by human intelligence collectors. Zero percent signature means an aggregate is impervious to HUMINT.

fixedRecordData.name: ElectronicSignatureStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: ElectronicSignaturePercent
field.semantics: A summary percentage of an aggregates susceptibility to detection of its electronic emissions. Zero percent means that the aggregate has no electronic emissions.

field.name: SensorArray
field.semantics: A list of sensors owned by the aggregate together with their respective operational status and range

fixedRecordData.name: CoverStatusStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Specifies the status of the cover

field.name: CoverStatusPercent
field.semantics: The percentage of protection enjoyed by an aggregate. A unit with 100 percent cover would be impervious to the effects of weapons fire

field.name: CoverTypeEnum
field.semantics: An optional field describing the type of cover employed by the aggregate

fixedRecordData.name: EntityListVariableLengthStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Provides data on one or more entities comprising the aggregate. This includes the initial list of all entities and subsequent updates as entities on the list experience change.

field.name: UpdateType
field.semantics: Indicates whether this update creates the list or modifies its' values

field.name: EntityList
field.semantics: Data about one or more entities comprising the list.

fixedRecordData.name: ResourceStatusNumberStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The name of a resource and the number of instances of that resource by health status.

field.name: NumberHealthyOrIntact
field.semantics: The number of healthy or intact resources

field.name: NumberSlightlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of slightly damaged resources

field.name: NumberModeratelyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of moderately damaged resources

field.name: NumberSignificantlyDamaged
field.semantics: The number of significantly damaged resources

field.name: NumberDestroyed
field.semantics: The number of destroyed or consumed resources

field.name: ResourceName
field.semantics: The name of the resource

fixedRecordData.name: EntityStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: An entity represented to the federation as part of the aggregate object which owns it.

field.name: Callsign
field.semantics: The unique identifier of the object.

field.name: EntityCategory
field.semantics: Indicates whether the entity is equipment, person, emitter, etc.

field.name: EntityStatus
field.semantics: The damage state of the entity.

field.name: IsDistinctObject
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. A BaseEntity object has been created to represent this entity (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: IsUnavailable
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. This entity is in use by another object (true) or not (false). Default is false.

field.name: Facing
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Direction is measured in degrees clockwise from orientation of unit. Default is 0.

field.name: Concealment
field.semantics: OPTIONAL. Indicates whether the entity is concealed and, if so, how

field.name: OffsetLocation
field.semantics: The entity location given as an offset from the location of the aggregate unit in meters.

fixedRecordData.name: SensorStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Defines a sensor,operational status, damage status, coverage and ID

field.name: SensorStateEnum
field.semantics: The operational status of the sensor

field.name: SensorDamageState
field.semantics: The damage status of the sensor

field.name: SensorCoverage
field.semantics: The maximum range of the sensor

field.name: SensorID
field.semantics: A sensor owned by the aggregate
